data.title: Home Builder in Fall River, New Bedford, Westport and South Eastern Massachusetts
data.meta_description: Bristol Pacific is the go-to Home Builder for first-time home buyers in South Eastern Massachusetts, as well as the go-to solution for commercial clients who want to build out office space, retail space and new Gas & Convenience stores in Rhode Island and Massachusetts.
data.text:
It’s perhaps the most important factor in deciding where you live. For more than 30 years of designing and building new homes, Bristol Pacific has understood that and has had one primary focus—to design and build the perfect home for you and your family.

We deliver quality construction and take care of the details. We understand that you might love to entertain and that you might have always dreamed of a farmer’s sink in your dream kitchen, for example. Bristol Pacific’s reputation for going above and beyond has evolved from our unmatched craftsmanship, unrivaled quality, and most importantly, our ability to listen.

Whether you choose one of our existing new construction homes in our beautiful developments or have us build on a lot you own, we’ll help you make your dream home a reality.

We would never put our name on a home that we wouldn’t be proud to live in ourselves, because in fact, we already do.

Our commitments to quality, value and customer service have helped position us as the go-to construction and design contracting company in communities across Massachusetts, including Westport, Fall River, New Bedford, Acushnet, Freetown, Dartmouth, Swansea and others.
